D35E.title: RNK-Quantum D35E
D35E.description: A revolutionary game system for running games of D35E in the Foundry VTT environment with vortex technology.
SETTINGS.D35EDiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.D35EInitTBL: Append the raw Dexterity ability score to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.D35EExpRateL: The rate at which characters advance in levels
SETTINGS.D35ENoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.D35EBackgroundSkillsH: Use the Background Skills optional ruleset
SETTINGS.D35EFractionalBaseBonusesH: Use the Fractional Base Bonuses optional ruleset
SETTINGS.D35EPCWoundsAndVigorH: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for player characters.
SETTINGS.D35ENPCWoundsAndVigorH: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for nonplayer characters.
SETTINGS.D35EAutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.D35EMeasureStyleL: Whether to use RNK-Quantum's measurement style instead of FoundryVTT's default style
SETTINGS.D35ELowLightVisionModeH: When checked, players who have no token selected will not benefit from any of their tokens' low-light vision (this also applies to darkvision)
SETTINGS.D35EAuraVerticalEuclideanH: When enabled, aura height checks use direct vertical distance only. When disabled, aura height checks use Euclidean distance (horizontal + vertical).
SETTINGS.D35ESharedVisionModeH: Controls whether players share vision across all owned tokens or only controlled tokens.
SETTINGS.D35PreloadCompendiumsH: Whether to preload compendium browsers on page load
